summary: The diff shows comprehensive implementation of all requirements including SPA structure, glassmorphic login with Full Name field, localStorage.AXON_MASTER_USER persistence, dashboard with 5 sidebar sections, KPI components, waveform/synopsis engine, 3-tier pricing (₹0/₹299/₹499), dynamic user name display, logout functionality, Invalid Credentials toast, and triple-click AXON logo bypass. All requirements appear to be implemented based on the diff evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Encryption/decryption functions in localStorageAuth.ts using base64 encoding with ENCRYPTION_KEY
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not specify encryption for localStorage data; only requires saving to localStorage.AXON_MASTER_USER without encryption requirements

hallucinated_features.description: AXON_USERS array storage alongside AXON_MASTER_USER in localStorageAuth.ts
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest specifies only localStorage.AXON_MASTER_USER as the storage key; AXON_USERS array for multiple users was not requested

hallucinated_features.description: QueryClient and React Query integration with TelemetryProvider and GhostModeProvider
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals explicitly state 'Backend API integration for authentication (using localStorage instead)'; QueryClient suggests backend API preparation not requested
Error boundary implementation was not requested in any requirement; BuildRequest focuses on fixing syntax errors and implementing specific UI features

hallucinated_features.description: RECOMMENDED badge on SOVEREIGN CORE pricing tier
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest specifies three pricing tiers but does not mention highlighting any tier as 'recommended'
